name: Image Fight & X-Multiply
overview: A compilation of two classic Irem shooters, Image Fight and X-Multiply. Both are based on the superior arcade versions (Image Fight was ported to the NES.) Image Fight is a top-down blaster through the blackness of space, while X-Multiply is very similar in design to Irem's most known shooter, R-Type (it even features add-on components similar to the option subship).
